ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Charm Change
ygData.msgSnippet: Someone had showed an analysis regarding bard mana regen. They showed the differences between just standing around, medding, medding while singing clarity
ygData.messageBody:
Someone had showed an analysis regarding bard mana regen. They showed the
differences between just standing around, medding, medding while singing
clarity song, and medding while singing clarity song and having clarity
buff. Surprisingly, it showed that we do indeed recover mana faster with
things that enhance mana regen.

If someone knows where this research is, I'd love to see it again myself.

---Windleaf

At 08:23 PM 5/14/01 +0000, Robert(Bob) Smith wrote:
> > Mana would not be a real issue, just sit down and med between
>battles.
>
>I am not trying to cause problems, but what do you have in your
>flute? *Smiles* As far as I know, this will do you no good unless
>your "between fights" is 40 minutes. *Grins*
>
>Did I miss something with Bard, Mana, and medding?
>
>Gaelthorne,
>Xegony
>
